function.name: logOut
function.description: Enables the log out of an authenticated user or application from the SE API.

step.originalText: The function SHALL check if the user that has invoked the function has the status authenticated. If the status is not authenticated, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorUserNotAuthenticated and exit the function.
step.germanText: Prüfe, ob der aufrufende Benutzer authentifiziert ist. Falls nicht: Werfe ErrorUserNotAuthenticated und beende Funktion.
step.pseudocode: WENN Benutzer NICHT authentifiziert DANN WERFE ErrorUserNotAuthenticated BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

step.originalText: If the user has the status authenticated, the status for the userId of the user calling the function SHALL be set to "not authenticated".
step.germanText: Falls der Benutzer authentifiziert ist: Setze den Status der userId auf "nicht authentifiziert".
step.pseudocode: WENN Benutzer authentifiziert DANN SETZE Status = nicht authentifiziert ENDE

step.originalText: The function SHALL invoke the functionality of the Secure Element to determine the log message parts for the event data regarding the log-out. If the execution of this Secure Element functionality fails, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorSigningEventDataFailed and exit the function.
step.germanText: Rufe die Secure-Element-Funktionalität auf, um die Log-Nachricht-Teile für die Log-out-Ereignisdaten zu ermitteln. Bei Fehler: Werfe ErrorSigningEventDataFailed und beende Funktion.
step.pseudocode: WENN Operation fehlgeschlagen DANN WERFE ErrorSigningEventDataFailed BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

errorCase.trigger: Die Ausführung der SE-Funktionalität schlägt fehl

step.originalText: The function SHALL retrieve the parts of the log message determined by the Secure Element. If the retrieval of the log message parts fails, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorRetrieveLogMessageFailed and exit the function.
step.germanText: Hole die Log-Nachricht-Teile vom Secure Element. Falls der Abruf fehlschlägt: Werfe ErrorRetrieveLogMessageFailed und beende Funktion.
step.pseudocode: VERSUCHE HOLE Log-Nachricht-Teile vom SE BEI_FEHLER WERFE ErrorRetrieveLogMessageFailed BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

errorCase.trigger: Der Abruf der Log-Nachricht-Teile schlägt fehl

step.originalText: The function SHALL store the data of the previously retrieved log message parts on the storage medium. If the data has not been stored successfully, the function SHALL raise the exception ErrorStoringLogMessageFailed and exit the function.
step.germanText: Speichere die zuvor abgerufenen Log-Nachricht-Teile auf dem Speichermedium. Falls die Speicherung fehlschlägt: Werfe ErrorStoringLogMessageFailed und beende Funktion.
step.pseudocode: VERSUCHE SPEICHERE Log-Nachricht-Teile auf Speichermedium BEI_FEHLER WERFE ErrorStoringLogMessageFailed BEENDE_FUNKTION ENDE

errorCase.trigger: Die Daten wurden nicht erfolgreich gespeichert

step.originalText: The function SHALL return without raising an exception to indicate that the execution of the function has been successful.
step.germanText: Gebe ohne Exception zurück, um die erfolgreiche Ausführung anzuzeigen.

returnValue.description: This function does not return a value.

asn1Structure.logMessage: LogMessage ::= SEQUENCE { version INTEGER (3), certifiedDataType OBJECT IDENTIFIER (id-SE-API-system-log), certifiedData SystemLogMessage, -- embedded system log serialNumber OCTET STRING (SIZE (32)), signatureAlgorithm AlgorithmIdentifier, seAuditData OCTET STRING OPTIONAL, signatureCounter INTEGER, signatureCreationTime Time, signatureValue OCTET STRING }
asn1Structure.systemLogMessage:
SystemLogMessage ::= SEQUENCE { version INTEGER (3), certifiedDataType OBJECT IDENTIFIER (id-SE-API-system-log), eventType [0] IMPLICIT PrintableString ("logOut"), eventOrigin [1] IMPLICIT PrintableString OPTIONAL, eventTriggeredByUser [2] IMPLICIT UserId OPTIONAL, eventData [3] IMPLICIT LogOutEventData, additionalInternalData [4] IMPLICIT OCTET STRING OPTIONAL, serialNumber OCTET STRING (SIZE (32)), signatureAlgorithm AlgorithmIdentifier, signatureCounter INTEGER, signatureCreationTime Time, signatureValue OCTET STRING }
LogOutEventData ::= SEQUENCE { loggedOutUserId UserId, logOutCause LogOutCause }

field.name: version
field.description: Version of the log message format. SHALL be set to '3'.

field.name: certifiedDataType
field.description: MUST be set to the OID id-SE-API-system-log.

field.name: eventOrigin
field.description: Component that triggered the event (e.g., component name).

field.name: eventTriggeredByUser
field.description: User ID of the user that triggered the event.

field.name: additionalInternalData
field.description: MUST NOT be present. Reserved for future use.

field.name: serialNumber
field.description: Serial number of the Secure Element consisting of the hash value of the public key of the certificate used to verify system logs.

field.name: signatureCounter
field.description: Current count of signatures created with the log message signing key protected by the Secure Element.

field.name: signatureCreationTime
field.description: Point in time of the Secure Element when the log message was signed.

field.name: signatureValue
field.description: Result of the signature computation encoded as octet string.
